page.title: 07Fabdec Tanks.ELLESMERE
page.content: Fabdec make milk tanks,plate coolers, and wheat dryers.There are 45 workers there, 15 floor workers and 30 in the offices.The tanks and things go abroad as well,mostly to Germany. The metal they make them out of is stainless steel,protected by sticky plastic. To bend the metal into shape you program a computer that is attatched to a machine that forces it into shape, using a pressure of up to 120 tons. When all the pieces are ready they are welded together, polished, and the plastic comes off. When the tank is made there is a hole on the top. They also make plate coolers,that pass cold milk through water cooled plates. They buy the sheets and make the parts to fix them together.The milk tanks are to keep milk fresh,and to cool it when it comes from the cows.
